platforms.brief: GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter.

chapters.aboutBrief: Google Developers Group Ahmedabad (GDG Ahmedabad) is for developers who are interested in Google's developer technology.
chapters.name: GDG Ahmedabad

chapters.aboutBrief: GDG Baroda is a community where programmers meet to discuss and work with several Google developer resources and products.
chapters.name: GDG Baroda

chapters.aboutBrief: Google Developer Groups Rajkot is the first Google Developer Group in Saurashtra region of Gujarat.
chapters.name: GDG Rajkot

chapters.aboutBrief: GDG Surat is a student chapter or a group of like minded enthusiasts who will surely play a role to contribute to the developer ecosystem."
chapters.name: GDG Surat

platforms.name: gdg
